analysis.description:
Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0xdc2cb689c0cbbd7f2c0a5704412707387ce4a8bd.sol#569-570) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/10/0xdc2cb689c0cbbd7f2c0a5704412707387ce4a8bd.sol#569-570)

SintCrowdsale.distributeTeamTokens has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(MintableToken(token).mint(advisorWallets[i],advisorAllowance)) (/unique_chucks/10/0xdc2cb689c0cbbd7f2c0a5704412707387ce4a8bd.sol)
SintCrowdsale.teamWallet should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0xdc2cb689c0cbbd7f2c0a5704412707387ce4a8bd.sol#758-763)
